me: My name is Saleh Alghusson. There are many Saleh Alghusson's in my family, but I'm the coolest one
work: I work in technolgy as a full stack software engineer.
extra: Besides programming, I'm intersted in human languages, I know a handful of them but not so well, as I usually get distracted by the point I've learnt the basic structure. I also love to read and being in nature, preferably at the same time :)
future: In the next few years, I want to be fluent in a non-european/non-middle-eastren language. And for my career, I'd like to continue building general engineering skills but also specialze in either machine learning or security.
